decks.notes: This deck focuses on quickly filling the graveyard with cards like Basking Rootwalla and Blazing Rootwalla in order to bring back powerful creatures like Vengevine. The use of Bazaar of Baghdad and Serum Powder helps to dig through the deck and get the necessary cards in hand. Force of Will and other protective spells help to maintain board presence and protect key cards. The aim is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and disrupt their strategy with cards like Force of Vigor and Mindbreak Trap.
